related_questions.question:
6. Siti : I have a toothache    Lina : You should go to the ....
a. doctor b. dentist c. lawyer
d. hospital​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

b. dentist

Penjelasan:

Karena Siti mengalami sakit gigi, maka Siti harus pergi ke dokter gigi (dentist).

Doctor = dokter

Dentist = dokter gigi

Lawyer = pengacara

Hospital = rumah sakit

Semoga membantu :)

Jawaban:

I want to read some advertisement So I will borrow​ your newspaper / magazine.

Penjelasan:

Penulis ingin membaca beberapa iklan, jadi penulis akan meminjam koran / majalahmu untuk membacanya karena biasanya iklan (Advertisement) terdapat di koran / majalah.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question: Yg bantu jawab nanti ku follback+love+jawaban terbaik+five star​
Kata kerja present perfect tense dari bring, hate, feat, finish, di, draw, kick, write, call

answers.answer:
Bring = brought
Hate = hated
Finish = finished
Do = done
Draw = drawn
Kick = kicked
Write = written
Call = called
